definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

sentences.english: We will accelerate the improvement of the social security system that covers both urban and rural residents.
sentences.chinese: 加快健全覆盖城乡居民的社会保障体系。

sentences.english: Vigorously improve forest inhabitant people's livelihood.
sentences.chinese: 大力保障和改善林区民生。

sentences.english: The first group of affordable public housing tenants in Shenyang moved into their new homes yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 沈阳市保障性住房第一批住户昨天喜迁新居。

sentences.english: Occasionally, however, standards of poultry welfare must be safeguarded by legislation.
sentences.chinese: 然而有时候家禽福利标准必须由立法来保障。

sentences.english: But if you did come unhooked, here's a device that could save your life.
sentences.chinese: 但是如果你失去了保障，有一个装置能拯救你的生命。

sentences.english: First, the coverage of low-rent housing security should be expanded.
sentences.chinese: 一是扩大廉租住房制度的保障范围。

sentences.english: The third part is the guarantee of the rationality of free proof system.
sentences.chinese: 第三章为保障自由心证合理性的具体制度考察。

sentences.english: Protected in a contract, the system will eventually evolve into knowledge-sharing.
sentences.chinese: 在有契约保障下，系统最终会演化为知识共享。

sentences.english: Indemnificatory housing difficultly on difficultly in sources of fund.
sentences.chinese: 保障性住房难就难在资金来源。

sentences.english: In addition, Chinese external medicine provided necessary support for treating ulcer after the surgery.
sentences.chinese: 中药外用药的应用对创面的愈合提供了有力保障。

sentences.english: Study on Agricultural Socialized Service System in the Process of Building New Socialist Countrysides;
sentences.chinese: 社会化服务体系建设是发展非公有制林业的基本保障。

sentences.english: Both security and safety are also concepts requiring definitions, measuring systems and terminologies .
sentences.chinese: 安全和保障都是需要定义，测量手段以及术语的概念。

sentences.english: Also provided a powerful safeguard for the gravity quay construction of large caisson.
sentences.chinese: 也为大型沉箱结构重力式码头建设提供了有力的保障。

sentences.english: IV. Improving the mechanisms for organizing, leading and guaranteeing legal publicity and education.
sentences.chinese: 完善法制宣传教育的组织领导和保障机制。

sentences.english: And above all, practice safe sex.
sentences.chinese: 最后，于安全保障中实践一切。

sentences.english: Stanely:Maybe if there are more foreign investments, there will be more regulations to protect foreign investors.
sentences.chinese: 我想或许外资一多，就会有规范来保障外商吧。

definition: guarantee/to guarantee/to ensure/to safeguard/to pledge/CL:個|个[ge4]
to defend/to safeguard/to protect/to uphold/to maintain
norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
(of systems, facilities etc) comprehensive/well-developed/excellent/to refine/to improve
fears of trouble in the rear (idiom); family worries (obstructing freedom of action)/worries about the future consequences/often in negative expressions, meaning "no worries about anything"
